text: Beit Aghion (), also known as Beit Rosh HaMemshala (, lit. House of the Prime Minister) is the official residence of the Prime Minister of Israel. It is at 9 Peretz Smolenskin street, on the street corner of Balfour street in the Jerusalem neighborhood of Rehavia, between the city center and Talbiya neighborhood. Category:Buildings and structures in Jerusalem Category:Government buildings in Israel
title: Beit Aghion
